data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 175 believers in Sa`dah to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sa‘dah, Yemen
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Sa‘dah, Yemen, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sa‘dah, Yemen.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Sa‘dah, Yemen to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 836,337 lost people in  Sa‘dah, Yemen have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, Northern Yemeni people might believe through him.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Sa‘dah, Yemen.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Sa‘dah, Yemen know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sa‘dah, Yemen has a population of 838,000.

We estimate Sa`dah has 175 people who might know Jesus, 1,488 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 836,337 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4,788 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Sa`dah.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
